storyInfo: While Texas sits in prison, various forces on the outside begin to clash, and a plot to assassinate Lavinia takes shape.

attributes.content: Woooah, this dress looks absolutely stunning!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You'n say that again. Sora's gonna look mighty fine in it.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: If someone told me about this earlier, I would've signed up myself!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: No way, no how. Ya don't know the first thing about actin'.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I can just act like I always do.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: And there ain't no roles for a Sankta in Siracusa neither!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Says who? I heard that there was a Sankta with Signora Sicilia—
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Signorina Sally, our boss is inviting you over for dinner.
attributes.name: Frivolous Mafioso

attributes.content: Um... But...
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: She's on her way to rehearsal right now. Vaffanculo.
attributes.name: Stony-Faced Bodyguard

attributes.content: And our boss wants to have a word with Signorina Sally here. Being a little late won't make a difference, will it?
attributes.name: Frivolous Mafioso

attributes.content: I, I'll go get the director...
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: The director? I might've carried water for him in the past, but these days...
attributes.name: Frivolous Mafioso

attributes.content: Um, please don't...
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: The hell are you playin' nice with them for?
attributes.name: Angry Mafioso

attributes.content: You should feel honored that our boss wants to see you. If you don't wanna get messed up, behave yourself and come with us.
attributes.name: Angry Mafioso

attributes.content: Wait, the boss didn't say we could—
attributes.name: Frivolous Mafioso

attributes.content: You still don't understand what the boss was gettin' at? We were all scared of the Bellones before.
attributes.name: Angry Mafioso

attributes.content: But now that they are out of the picture, and the bigwigs are about to shuffle the deck again, we'll never get a better chance!
attributes.name: Angry Mafioso

attributes.content: Huh, you're right. Let's go, brothers, time to clean the streets of these eyesores!
attributes.name: Frivolous Mafioso

attributes.content: Tch... Protect Signorina Sally!
attributes.name: Stony-Faced Bodyguard

attributes.content: The heck's happenin', Exu— Huh? Where'd she go?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: She already rushed out. Let's back her up!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Stony-Faced Bodyguard

attributes.content: Heh, and you call yourself a bodyguard?
attributes.name: Frivolous Mafioso

attributes.content: Ahh... *sobs*...
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Right this way, signorina.
attributes.name: Frivolous Mafioso

attributes.content: I, I know...
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Huh? You people are—
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Who the hell are you?!
attributes.name: Frivolous Mafioso

attributes.content: Catch me if you can.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Tch, get her!
attributes.name: Frivolous Mafioso

attributes.content: Don't mess with us!
attributes.name: Angry Mafioso

attributes.content: Let's split!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Your name's Sally, right? You okay?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Do you know what you've done?!
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: You didn't save me at all, you're just making things worse! They're not going to let this go!
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: So how'd you plan to get out of that mess?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...By gritting my teeth.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Huh? But they were gonna hurt you.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I... can deal with injuries.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Did you really think they were going to kidnap me? They're just trying to cause trouble.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Shouldn't you at least call for help when stuff like this happens?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What's the point? Nobody's going to intervene in a struggle between famiglie.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: What about that Judge Lavinia lady? She seemed like a pretty decent person to me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: She's... indeed a very good judge, but there's nothing she can do in these situations.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Besides, even if I never made it out of this park, how many people would know that I disappeared because of the conflict between those mafiosi?
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: So... you're just going to put up with it?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: How else are we supposed to live our lives? This is how it's always been.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Find a place to hide, wait until the dust settles, and then follow the victorious side out. That's all I can do.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: But... why does it have to be like that?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Ugh, I'm sorry. I'm not trying to blame you, but to be honest, this is the first time in my life I've ever known what it feels like to be protected.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: That famiglia isn't even particularly influential. The director should be able to help me smooth things over.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: But just as a friendly word of advice, if you plan to stay alive in Siracusa, please try to avoid doing that kind of stuff in the future.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Especially considering what's about to happen.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: What's about to happen?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Have you not seen the news at all? Carracci, Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici, is dead.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Yeah, saw that. Assassinated, looks like?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I feel so bad for him.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Since you all seem nice enough, I'll tell you a little more about him.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: I have to deal with mafiosi pretty regularly, so I've heard a thing or two from them.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: The person who murdered him hasn't been found yet, and the young master of Famiglia Bellone was also attacked at the same time.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Huh? Bellone?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's right. The Bellones were poised to stand head and shoulders above the other famiglie, but it seems like someone's been plotting against them for a while now.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Many famiglie that had previously given up are now starting to move again, little by little.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Did you hear any of them mention the name Texas?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Texas? There's not a single person in Siracusa who doesn't know that name.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: But usually in the context of 'the last Texas' or something along those lines...
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Really?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You're a strange one, you know that? It's obviously all made-up. How could there possibly be a Texas still alive out there?
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: But... Alright, you have a point.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: In any case, you should already know that our troupe has some connections to Famiglia Bellone, through the director.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Just as those people were saying, in the past everyone wanted to get on his good side. But now...
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: You all saw what happened.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Do all of Siracusa's famiglie go around doing whatever the hell they want like that?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...Remember what I'm about to tell you.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: If you want to survive in Siracusa, you either need to join a famiglia, or stay as far away from them as possible.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Then... you need to delude yourself into believing that as long as you stay away from them, you won't get sucked into any trouble.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Alright, I should head back to the theater now.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Aaaaaaaahhhh—!
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: What now?!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: S-Someone's been tied up over here!
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Assuming nothin' outta the ordinary happened, someone ought to have found the poor fella by now.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I don't get it, man. Why go through all that trouble keeping him alive, just to let him go? What's so special about that guy anyway?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: What it proves is, that shady bartender wanted him to be found.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: As for why... it's usually a trap.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Tch, what a sinister fella.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: You say that now, but if he ends up winning, you're gonna be calling him a genius.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Dipshit.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: What's so funny?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I just remembered how we used to argue like this back when we were kids.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Never would've imagined that after all these years, after all of life's twists and turns, the two of us'd still be out here, fightin' for our lives.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: That's fate for you. Never know where it's gonna take you.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Heh. Ain't that the truth.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Who could've known something like that would happen in Lungmen?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: And that after all that, we'd still come back to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Gambino... If, and I mean if, Lappland has really decided to leave us alone, and let us fend for ourselves...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Would you still stay in Siracusa?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: What, do you miss your Lungmen that bad?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Hmph. Forget it, not like you'd ever understand anyway.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Let's talk about something more practical. You really plan on switching employers?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Looking at the news, the guy we tried to off today was Don Bellone's son. Seems like someone real important died at the same time.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Which sounds to me an awful lot like some unknown famiglia has been using us as their weapons.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Might as well go make that relationship formal, then.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Better than taking on odd jobs and begging for scraps.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: That's right. As soon as you're back in Siracusa, you participate in an attempted assassination of one of the Dodici dons. You two sure have grown.
Guess the good ol' days are over...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Lappland...
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Oh? Today's breakfast is looking pretty good.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Pay for your own.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Aw, is that any way to treat your boss?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So, what've you been up to all this time?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I went to say hi to the folks, and got to enjoy some sorely-missed family time. Simple as that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Haah, what a relief that despicable old mug back home is just as punchable as it's always been.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You with a famiglia?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Oh, did I never mention it? My last name is Saluzzo.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Saluzzo?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: You're a Saluzzo?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Capone, do you know what the thing I hate the third most is?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Capone feels a chill course through his body, but the sensation is so fleeting that he has to wonder if it was his imagination.
When people start wailing and moaning once they hear the name of my famiglia.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Ah, come to think of it, the way you do things really does remind me of that one famiglia.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What about the other two things? If I'm gonna die, might as well die knowing.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Haha. Seems like you've picked up on how to get along with me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Actually, I just came up with that line on the spot.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Alright, talk to me. So why'd the two of you decide to do a hit on Famiglia Bellone?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Sorry for bothering you, Signor Segretario.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: No, no, Your Honor, the pleasure is mine.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Your office is... quite impressive.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Haha, I frequently have distinguished guests here, and this is the sort of decor they prefer, so I figured I'd go along with it.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: So, did you need me for something?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I wanted to talk to you about Carracci's death.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Hmm? I believe I already made a statement about that.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But I wanted to have a chat with you, for more personal reasons.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Oh right... I heard you swore you'd find Carracci's murderer and bring them to justice.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Good, good. Young folks ought to have that kind of drive.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: So have you made any progress?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Unfortunately, not yet.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Sorry to hear that.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I heard you'd always been on good terms with him personally, so...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's true. Carracci was greatly concerned with the citizenry's well being, things such as food, water, and sanitation.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: But I don't think there's anything I can do to assist you.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I never actually mingled my way into his innermost circle.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: So while I'd love to help, there's nothing I can do.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Anything you can give me is fine. A place you think is suspicious, or anyone in the government I should keep an eye on.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You're asking too much. You understand what I'm saying, don't you?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Your Honor... several other Ministri dei Lavori Pubblici died before Carracci. Do you remember them?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Seven? Or maybe eight?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: The people in those positions were just puppets. Each famiglia was trying to push their own people up there.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: But in the end, they were all taken out by other famiglie.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: When it came to a position as important as il Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici, though, I'll be blunt here, it was clear as day why the famiglie filled the position with a man as spotless as Carracci instead of installing one of their cronies.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: For one simple reason: if the killing continued, the construction of the city would grind to a halt.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: 'If our people can't get in, then we'll at least make sure yours can't either.' That is why Carracci occupied that seat.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Make no mistake, he had close ties with the Bellones. The Don's son even sat beside him as his secretary. But, in one way or another, he was just as close with every other famiglia.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: There's an ancient Yan saying to the effect of 'he who walks oft along the river, inevitably finds his shoes wet,' yes? I have always trusted in Carracci's integrity, but so what? Others did not see it that way.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: The way Siracusans think, you either choose to be one famiglia's pet, or you choose to be another's.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: In other words, Carracci's death was inevitable. He wasn't part of any of famiglia's vision for the future. Do you think he was oblivious to that fact?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: In the end, it doesn't matter whether he died today, a month ago, or a month from now.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You know how much hard work he put in.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: And what did he get for it in the end?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Actually, let's assume he was as selfless a person as you say. What did the people he worked so hard for, those whom he so eloquently claimed as 'his dear citizens,' give him in the end?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Your Honor, I've also heard a great many rumors about you.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You undeniably have a fair number of accomplishments under your belt.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: But among them, how many were due solely to your own hard work, and how many were influenced by the people behind your back? You already know the answer, don't you?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If I may be frank, Your Honor, are you really not here to test me on behalf of Bellone?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: That is not my intention, I swear.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...I'd prefer it were.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Then please heed this word of caution, Your Honor.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Let those who've died stay dead.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: We already have too much to worry about without overly concerning ourselves with the deceased.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: And... this is the attitude of someone who was on good terms with him?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If you want to have a slightly longer lease on life in Volsinii's government, I'd suggest you learn this lesson well.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Oh, hello sweetheart. Ah, I'm still at work right now. Are you ready to go?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Mm, alright. I'll get ready to head over then.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Okay, okay.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: That was my daughter. Now, a newly-opened restaurant has invited me to inspect their ingredients tonight.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: We'll have to set aside our discussion for later.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Oh right, please let Master Leontuzzo know that he is welcome to talk to me if he's interested in the gourmet experience.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: ...I'll remember to pass it on.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Now then, please see yourself out.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What did you say? You found someone unconscious and tied up? The leader of the bunch that attacked the restaurant?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Understood. I'll be there right away.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'm telling you, the two of us just happened to be involved in that hit. We don't know nothing.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: As for the guy who handed out the orders, we don't know which famiglia he belongs to, but he sure was generous with the cash.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: They were clearly looking for hitmen with murky backgrounds like you two, so when you die, there'd be no trail back to who hired you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You might think you ran into them by chance, but it wouldn't surprise me if they had their eyes on you a long time ago.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'm not saying they didn't.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: So, want to take a crack at who your employer is?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Probably... the Rossatis or the Saluzzos. Of the Dodici who've been fighting over this city all this time, and with the Bellones out of the picture, they're the only two famiglie with enough power left.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Right, I'm sure most people would think the same.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But now you know the Saluzzos were never planning anything like that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That just leaves... the Rossatis?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: One more.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Remember those poor suckers you took out early on? They were originally targeting people from il Ministero dei Lavori Pubblici.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Don Bellone's son's been working there, so another way of putting this is that the folks you dealt with were trying to get in Bellone's way.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So... what you're saying is, we helped the Bellones put down a threat, but then turned right around and hit 'em even harder.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: ...So what? We see famiglie doing that kinda power jockeying stuff every day.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: That... He's got a point. The first hit we made might've just been on some unlucky, short-sighted bastards.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But don't forget, you were specifically sent to 'shut them up.'
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Wait, are you serious?!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Are you suggesting... there's a double agent inside the Bellones?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Just another possibility.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Hahaha, but hey, that's what makes things interesting.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Let's assume that's true and do a little thought experiment here.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Carracci, il Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici, is dead. And before that, several more people in the ministero were killed.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Naturally, most people are going to see those things as connected, especially that poor judge.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But. The perpetrator who carried out the hit has already been silenced, and she can't find their leader either. She's at a complete loss, so what does she do next?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: If only some kind of clue would appear.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And what do you know, isn't that assassin you dumped out there the best possible lead?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So that's why they waited until now to throw that guy out...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: It does make sense, when you put it that way.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Then, they set up a little ambush, and make sure the judge has an 'accident'...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Kaboom.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland stretches out her hands and falls back onto the sofa, as if knocked back by the blast.
Everyone's gonna get pulled in.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Ahh, what a great idea.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It's so great that even if this is all bullshit, I'd want to make it reality.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So... lemme get this straight, you two are sayin' that the Bellones are puttin' on a whole goddamn opera?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: It's definitely possible.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: After all, nobody understands the Bellones better than themselves.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Hmph. I don't buy it.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: These are the famiglia's plans for the future we're talking about. There ain't a single wise guy in all of Siracusa who'd attack his own famiglia at a time like this.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Gambino, you should've realized by now that kinda blind confidence is what brought down the Sicilians.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: But I gotta say, I think I agree with you this time.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Aha! Then maybe they're putting on this show to feign weakness, so everyone thinks they're vulnerable and—
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But they were already on the cusp of victory.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Do you seriously think that the Bellones just decided to give up on a city that was right at their fingertips, just to turn this whole place upside-down?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Are they crazy or something?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Who knows? There are more lunatics walking this land than you might think.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Haha, but I guess our merry mealtime needs to wrap up.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I hope you have a jolly ol' time out there.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You stopped by just to say hello?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: What, are you that eager to be my henchmen?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I wouldn't say it's high on my priorities.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But at least tell us which side you're on.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Last thing I want is to end up fighting against you without realizing, and dying without knowing what hit me.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Me? Naturally, I'll always be Texas's most loyal supporter.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Is everyone in position for the ambush?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: You seem like you want to say something.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I was just thinking... I feel bad for Signorina Lavinia.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Whatever the case may be, she's a friend to the famiglia.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: If only the one she befriended wasn't Leon, the next don of Famiglia Bellone—
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Look, I don't want to be the villain either.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: So she wants to play her little game of justice. Sure, that we can allow, to an extent.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But she thinks she has the backing of one of the bosses. What she's done over the years has had a larger and larger impact on Leon... No, on our entire famiglia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The Bellones don't need softness like that.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: She must be made crystal-clear of this fact, and so must Leon.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Otherwise...
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: We'll never be able to seize ultimate victory from the chaos that's about to ensue.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But, the young master, he—
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: I know many of you are still conflicted about this. I will assume full responsibility for whatever happens. When Leon eventually comes asking who to blame, I won't get any of you involved.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.text: Cellinia, I need to send you to stay in Siracusa for a while.

The Columbian famiglie changed into opulent attire, took up residence in luxurious mansions, and stepped into the so-called upper class, thinking they had clearly delineated a boundary between them and Siracusa.
'Siracusa is barbaric, while we are not.' They spoke those words, thinking themselves superior to our homeland.
Your father's been captured by this line of thinking too.
As for you, I need you to see for yourself.
See the place we came from. See if we're any different from them.

attributes.content: ...Who's there?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I've brought you some chocolate. Want some?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I see prison security in Siracusa is as shoddy as ever.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You know, they call this one impregnable, at least compared to other cities.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Texas lets out a tiny sigh, and takes a bite out of the chocolate in Lappland's hand.
It's her least favorite flavor.
Hah. And here I thought you'd be chasing me out instead.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That takes a lot more effort than just ignoring you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So long as you don't get in my way, do whatever you want.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Aw, I'm almost moved to tears here, Texas. Even you're gradually figuring out how to get along with me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I never get in other peoples' way. I'd much rather clear the fog for them, so they can better see where they're going.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: How much do the Saluzzos know?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: No more than you do.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The Bellones were pretty much a shoo-in to win, but to keep the Rossatis down, they even brought you back from Lungmen, as a precautionary measure of sorts.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But right at the critical moment, yesterday's assassination took place.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It's so blatant that people can't help but think it had to be intentional. Is the perpetrator even trying to stay hidden?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So what about you? Planning to sit in this cell reminiscing about every little thing that happened in Lungmen until that judge lets you go?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Weren't you in a hurry to get back there?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: If you consider the wait as just another leg of the journey home, then I can be pretty patient.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But what if that judge is in danger?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Where is he? Has he woken up yet?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Good to see you here, Your Honor! We've already taken full control of the scene.
attributes.name: Court Clerk

attributes.content: The suspect is still unconscious, but he was tied up and stuffed into a trash can over by the corner. We've already notified the hospital.
attributes.name: Court Clerk

attributes.content: Who found him?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: A group of actors from Compagnia dell'alba. They already left because they had a rehearsal to get to.
attributes.name: Court Clerk

attributes.content: Compagnia dell'alba... Bernardo's people?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: He really is cursed with bad luck.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Your Honor, the people murdered in the witness elimination case you reported last time were this person's accomplices, right?
attributes.name: Court Clerk

attributes.content: Yes, but we couldn't find anything on them to identify them with.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Why would their leader show up here in such a sorry state then...?
attributes.name: Court Clerk

attributes.content: Want me to try waking him up?
attributes.name: Court Clerk

attributes.content: Please do.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: Stop struggling. We already have you restrained.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...Lavinia.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: Do you understand the situation you're in? Who tied you up and dumped you here?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Do you really need to ask, judge?
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: Answer my question, murderer.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Heh. Maybe I can invoke Article 14 of the penal code to remain silent under informal investigations.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: ...You're pretty familiar with the law.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What, are you gonna use Article 132, the right of special dispensation, on me? Judge?
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: Just who are you?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Your average everyday murderer.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: I, I remember now... I've seen you before.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Last night at the restaurant, no? You rescued that hapless clerk from il Ministero dei Lavori Pubblici.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: It was three years ago, at a legal forum. Judge Bortolotti from the city of Sorrento gave a particularly outstanding speech.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Signor, I was deeply impressed by your report.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Well, I just kill people for a living now. It's an easy life. What you're talking about, I can barely even remember anymore.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: This isn't who you are.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Stop acting so self-righteous, Lavinia. You really think you understand me? Just from a fantasy-filled report at a window-dressing legal forum?
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: You can't hide true passion. That's what you said back then.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Right, along with all the other naive, idealistic nonsense I rattled off. All young people are like that, thinking they can change the world all on their own.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: I just happened to wake up sooner than you, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: You said, 'we should all strive to find the common line that can protect anyone.'
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Yes, here's an example: join a famiglia, listen to the boss, and kill anyone who gets in your way.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: Judge Bortolotti, I can help you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Hah! Help me?!
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: Oh, that's right. You have the great and powerful Bellones backing you.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: Your honor and dignity will stay untarnished. You won't get chained down or beaten up for a moment of naivete. You won't come home to the sight of your house going up in smoke along with your family.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: You don't know a damn thing, Judge Lavinia.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: You have no idea how weighty the code you hold in your hand is, and how easily it can destroy your life.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: And luckily for you, you'll never have a chance to find out.
attributes.name: Calm Hitman

attributes.content: Watch out, Lavinia!
attributes.name: Court Clerk

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We need to get out of here, now.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: They've sent a ton of people. Come with me.
attributes.name: Texas
